channel.title: javascript on Scott Dikowitz
channel.description: Recent content in javascript on Scott Dikowitz

item.title: Clacku
item.description: Clacku is a hyperlocal social app available for iOS and Android. See recent posts made from around your location. Use the explore page to see what people are talking about all around the world. Upvote posts that interest you. See what’s trending around you or around the world.

item.title: Online Leasing
item.description: Online Leasing is a mobile-first site designed to help a renter fill out an application for an apartment. Over the course of 10+ screens, the user fills in info about themself including income and employment, invites roommates and guarantors, and pays an application fee.

item.title: Call Banner
item.description: This call banner was developed in-house for Nestio. It enables agents to place outgoing or accept incoming calls directly through the browser. Implemented using twilio-client.js and twilio-sync.js. Follows the React composition pattern and makes use of the context API.

item.title: In-browser SMS/Email Messenger
item.description: Messenger was developed in-house for Nestio. Nessenger allows for sending SMS and Email to clients directly in browser. You can compose a message from the text box or select one of the choices created by machine learning algorithms.

item.title: Instashare
item.description: My take on instagram.com, written with React.js/Flux architecture. Instashare lets you make posts, as well as comment on them, like them, and follow users. A feed page displays posts by you and people you’re following.

item.title: Asteroids
item.description: Classic asteroids game written with HTML5 canvas and JavaScript. Fly your ship around using your arrow keys and destry rocks with your weapon (f key).
